column5: A clean guest room with queen sized bed, hardwoods, newly remodeled bathroom and extra sitting area, near the trendy bishop arts area. I'm a few blocks walking to Davis street espresso, the Kessler Theatre, Korean Fusion food, Common Desk (coworking) and a 24/7 taqueria. I'm also 7 blocks from the heart of the Bishop Arts entertainment district with some of Dallas' best bars and restaurants. We have hi speed wifi, a newly remodeled kitchen and living room, two bikes for use, and a friendly host!
column8: Walk to Bishop Arts (Queen Bed in Private Room)
